title: Will you buy a foldable phone from Apple? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably not. I say that, but without having seen a design from Apple, I can’t say for sure. From Apple’s patent portfolio, it’s clear that they’ve been looking into foldable phones probably longer than anyone. They haven’t shipped them to market for a couple of really good reasons… Durability is problem with the current batch.Cost is an issue with the current foldable phones.I’m intrigued by the concept of a foldable phone but I’ve yet to see an implementation of that concept that makes me want to get one. Presumably, having a foldable phone might negate the need for a tablet. Yet, when I look at what I use my iPad for, it’s highly unlikely I’d want to give that up for a foldable phone. Right now, it’s an interesting concept that doesn’t actually solve a real need.

No I won’t. It will surely be very expensive and getting a foldable phone has no benefits. What’s the point of getting a foldable phone though? If it is because of portability then a person should get a smaller device, along with another tablet and the accumulated cost will definitely not be more expensive than one foldable device.
